name: The Swedish Handicraft Organization
obverse: Bust of Gustav V facing left.
reverse: Woman sitting on a bench working on a wreath. Behind her is a forest. Beneath the bench is the Swedish coat of arms. The bottom of the medal is largely empty, probably meant for engraving something.
description: This medal was probably meant to be an award medal for members of The Swedish Handicraft Organization (Sveriges Handtverksorganisations).
